Title: X-Men
Overview: Two mutants, Rogue and Wolverine, come to a private academy for their kind whose resident superhero team, the X-Men, must oppose a terrorist organization with similar powers.
Tagline: Trust a few. Fear the rest.
Keywords: mutant, marvel comic, superhero, based on comic book, superhuman
production_companies: Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation, Donners' Company, Bad Hat Harry Productions, Marvel Enterprises, Springwood Productions, Genetics Productions
Cast: Patrick Stewart, Hugh Jackman, Ian McKellen
